description: You can create the SRD file with Sage's Report Designer tool. To open this utility, open "Tools" (with the gear icon) and select "Run Report Designer."

Sage reports allow you to perform a variety of actions and add different content. You can add images, change and apply report styles, filter and sort the order that information appears, divide information into groups, and add or remove criteria. You can also save your report data to other formats such as .CSV , .PDF , and .HTML .

NOTE: The SRD file was used by Sage Accounts version 12 and earlier. Sage 50 accounts have replaced the file, along with the ".srt", ."sly", and ".slb" files, with the ".report", ".layout", ".letter", and ".label" file extensions.
